game.description: Help the quirky inventor complete his life's work.
game.objective: Assist inventor Qwerty to gather the materials and tools he needs to build his invention.
game.reward: The Golden Wrench: unique item, levels up crafting skill instantly

tasks.description: Gather 10 Ether Ore from the Crystal Mines
Acquire the Rare Hyper Spanner from Grog, the tool dealer in Triton market
tasks.objective: Negotiate or purchase Hyper Spanner from Grog

tasks.description: Deliver the materials to Qwerty in his workshop

game.title: Qwerty's Magnum Opus
